name: Ibrahim Matta
content: Abraham Matta Abraham (Ibrahim) Matta Professor Computer Science College of Arts & Sciences Boston University 665 Commonwealth Ave, CDS 738 (7th floor) Boston, MA 02215, USA (617) 353-8919 matta -at- bu -dot- edu Iâ€™m currently on temporary leave at the National Science Foundation as a Program Director in the CISE Directorate, Division of CNS. Affiliated with: Hariri Institute for Computing Systems Engineering RISCS: Center for Reliable Information Systems and Cyber Security CISE: Center for Information and Systems Engineering If you are interested in graduate studies, please apply to the graduate program at Boston University, Computer Science in the College of Arts and Sciences. I am often unable to respond to individual inquiries so my apologies. Once you are admitted, I will be very happy to meet and discuss with you your plans for a successful and happy graduate life here at BU CS.
